channel.title: DataScience on Pavan Kumar's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in DataScience on Pavan Kumar's Blog

item.title: Analysis: College Branch vs salary among graduates
item.description: Based on the data, one can see the relationship between various college branches or majors and the salaries of the graduates. Read on to find out % of women, STEM etc:- have any correlation on the salries of the gradutes.

item.title: Used cars: Various car brands and their resale value.
item.description: I have used pandas and ebay car sales data of Germany to analyse resale values of major car brands. Read on to find out the costliest car brand, best value for money car brand etc:-

item.title: Analysis: Profitable apps on AppStore and PlayStore
item.description: What do all profitable apps have in common ? From a DataScience perspective, have a look at the profiles of the most profitable apps on Appstore and Playstore. Read on to find out which category of apps have more chance to succeed

item.title: DataScience: From exit surveys, understanding why employees are really leaving an organization
item.description: In this post, using a real case dataset of the exit surveys, let’s find out why the employees are leaving.

item.title: Analysing NewYork city high school SAT scores
item.description: In this post, using pandas I will try to analyse New York city’s high school SAT scores, and will try to look at any possible correlation between scores and gender, race, financial background, geographical location of schools.

item.title: What kind of posts attract higher user engagement?
item.description: Taking an example of HackerNews, let us look at what kind of posts attract higher user engagement.

item.title: Gender gap in college graduates.
item.description: Is the gender gap in college graduates still existing? Are we closing the gender gap or in fields like STEM, is it further increasing? Read on to find out

item.title: Understanding star wars survey
item.description: In this post, using pandas we will understand more about fan’s choice on favourite star war’s characters, films etc:-
